original_text: Once when the king of Syria was warring against Israel, he took counsel with his servants, saying, “At such and such a place shall be my camp.”
korean_text: 그 때에 아람 왕이 이스라엘과 더불어 싸우며 그의 신복들과 의논하여 이르기를 우리가 아무데 아무데 진을 치리라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: Once when the king of Syria was warring against Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 한 때 시리아 왕이 이스라엘과 전쟁할 때에

sentences.original_text: he took counsel with his servants
